name: Padel Haus Williamsburg
description: NYC's first premium indoor padel club in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, featuring spa-like locker rooms, social lounges, and a pro shop.

name: Padel Haus Dumbo
description: Premium indoor padel club in Brooklyn's DUMBO neighborhood with four top-tier courts, social lounges, and premium fitness equipment.

name: Padel Haus Greenpoint
description: Padel Haus's largest NYC location at 20,000 sq ft near McCarren Park, with five indoor courts and 28-foot ceilings.

name: Padel Haus Nashville
description: The largest premium padel club in the U.S. with eight indoor courts, Gibson Lounge, Aescape massage table, and Juice Haus in Music City.

name: Padel Haus Atlanta
address: 950 W Marietta St NW, Suite A125
description: Atlanta's first indoor padel club at Westside Paper, featuring six courts including a center court for competition, with 40-foot ceilings.

name: Padel Haus Denver
description: Padel Haus's first West Coast expansion in Denver's RiNo neighborhood with five indoor courts and 25-foot ceilings near the light rail.

name: Padel& Greenpoint
description: Premium padel club in Greenpoint with 4 doubles and 2 singles courts under a 36-foot soundproofed ceiling, plus a pro shop and lounge.

name: Reserve Padel SoLe Mia
description: Reserve Padel's first permanent 100,000 sq ft club with ten professional courts, a wellness center, gym, and Pura Vida cafe at SoLe Mia.

name: Reserve Padel Miami Seaplane
description: Waterfront padel club at the historic Miami Seaplane Base with six glass-enclosed courts, sunset deck, and Pura Vida cafe on Watson Island.

name: Wynwood Padel Club
description: Miami's vibrant padel hub in Wynwood with 8 open-air courts, a wellness studio, cafeteria, and full equipment rental in the arts district.

name: Padel X Miami
description: Downtown Miami's premier 10-court club near the Adrienne Arsht Center featuring Mejorset Grandslam courts with FIP-regulation premium courts and video technology.

name: Ultra Padel Aventura
description: Ultra Padel's Aventura location with 8 outdoor courts, 2 singles courts, and a stadium court, plus a snack bar and equipment rental.

name: Urban Padel Doral
description: The largest indoor padel club in the U.S. with 12 Adidas-branded courts across 65,820 sq ft of climate-controlled space in Doral.

name: Champions Padel Club
description: Community-focused padel club in Doral with five outdoor courts, experienced coaching staff, and popular Americano tournament format events.

name: Casas Padel Club Aventura
description: Outdoor padel club at Aventura Mall featuring DIXSON courts, certified coaching, and a retail store for padel equipment.

name: Legio GP World
description: Premium padel experience in Boca Raton with 10 professional courts, VIP lounge, certified instructors, wellness center, and swimming pool.

name: 10by20 Padel Fort Lauderdale
description: Fort Lauderdale padel club with 10 courts, a wellness center with cold plunge and sauna, swimming pool, and Pura Vida cafe near I-95.

name: The Replay Club
description: Luxury indoor padel and wellness club in Boynton Beach with 10 climate-controlled courts, sauna, steam room, cold plunges, and a cafe.

name: USTA National Campus
description: The USTA's 64-acre national campus in Lake Nona with four padel courts alongside world-class tennis facilities and programming.

name: Orlando Padel Club
description: Orlando's only indoor padel club with two indoor and one outdoor court, offering lessons and open play for all skill levels.

name: SODO Padel
description: Three state-of-the-art outdoor padel courts in Orlando's SODO district with private lessons, tournament hosting, and Playtomic booking.

name: SVB Tennis & Wellness Center
description: Boutique padel club with 5 lighted courts near Tampa, plus 11 tennis courts, cryotherapy, salt room, and on-site restaurant.

name: St. Pete Athletic Paddle & Social
description: Tampa Bay's premier paddle and social club at The Factory with 2 indoor padel courts, 14 pickleball courts, restaurant, bars, and coworking space.

name: Padel39 Austin
description: Premium padel club near The Domain and Q2 Stadium with 6 courts, an 8,000 sq ft clubhouse, recovery area, bar, and co-working space.

name: Dallas Padel Club by Padel39
description: Indoor padel club in the Dallas-Fort Worth area with 3 courts, undergoing major renovation to add 7 outdoor courts and premium amenities by 2026.

name: Los Angeles Padel Club
description: LA's largest padel club with seven outdoor courts, coworking space, wellness amenities, members' lounge, gym, and free parking.

name: The Padel Courts Los Angeles
description: Community-focused padel club on Sunset Blvd with two full-sized and one mini court, LED floodlighting, clinics, and open play sessions.

name: LA Galaxy Park Padel
description: Padel courts at the LA Galaxy sports complex at Dignity Health Sports Park, alongside futsal, soccer, and pickleball facilities.

name: Padel N9NE
description: The first adidas padel flagship facility in the U.S. with 8 competition-level panoramic courts, gym and wellness facilities, plus five on-site restaurants.

name: Kingdom of Padel
description: San Diego's only indoor padel facility in a converted Harley-Davidson warehouse with 6 climate-controlled courts, golf simulators, and a beer and wine bar.

name: Barnes Tennis Center Padel
description: San Diego's first tennis center to add padel with 7 carbon panoramic courts alongside 25 tennis courts in the Point Loma area.

name: P1 Padel Las Vegas
description: Las Vegas's premier padel club with 8 state-of-the-art courts, a stylish clubhouse, coaching programs, and 48 free parking spaces.

name: Conquer Padel Club
description: Indoor padel club in south Tempe with 7 courts featuring 30-foot ceilings, cold plunge, infrared sauna, red light therapy, and top-level coaching.

name: Padel Pals
description: Arizona's first fully indoor padel club with 7 professional courts across 42,000 sq ft, coworking spaces, kids' playground, and player lounge.

name: Camelback Padel Club
description: Private, lighted padel court at the base of Camelback Mountain in Phoenix with on-site lessons, coaching, and equipment available.

name: Union Padel Club
description: 30,000 sq ft indoor padel club in Chicago's West Loop with 5 courts, sauna, cold plunge, game room, coworking space, and restaurant bar.

name: Padel Clube
description: Illinois's first padel facility in Mundelein with 7 courts, personal training, recovery area, pro shop, and a welcoming community focus.

name: Alma Padel
description: Chicago's North Shore first padel club with 5 courts, 30-foot ceilings, golf simulator, saunas, fitness area, bar, and cafe in Glenview.

name: ITP Training Academy
description: Full-service tennis, pickleball, and padel facility in Metro Atlanta with 4 indoor padel courts, viewing deck, kitchen and bar with court views.

name: Racket Social Club Alpharetta
description: Premier racquet club north of Atlanta with 4 padel courts, 18 tennis courts, resort-style pools, full-service marina, and multiple membership tiers.

name: Parker Racquet Club
description: Colorado's first padel courts with 4 outdoor courts, certified USPA coaching, and a welcoming center with lounge and outdoor patio for events.

name: PADELHUB Boston
description: New England's largest padel facility in South Boston's Seaport with 6 indoor courts, 35+ ft ceilings, adidas pro-shop, lounge, and 45 free parking spots.

name: Sensa Padel Boston
description: Boston's first padel facility in Hyde Park with 4 indoor courts boasting the country's tallest 40+ foot ceilings, open 7am to 11pm daily.

name: Padel Boston Dedham
description: Massachusetts' first dedicated padel facility with 3 panoramic indoor Portico Sport courts, 25+ ft ceilings, cafe, and expert coaching.

name: Ballers Boston Seaport
description: Social sports concept in Boston's Seaport with 3 padel courts, 5 pickleball courts, a golf simulator, and a full-service outdoor cafe.

name: Padel United Sports Club
description: The largest padel club in the Northeast, housed in a 36,000 sq ft converted warehouse in Cresskill with 7 indoor courts, cafe, retail shop, pool, and spa.

name: Centercourt Padel Morristown
description: Premium padel facility in Morristown with 3 indoor and 3 outdoor courts, expert coaching, a lounge, and pro shop for year-round play.

name: The Club at Monroe
description: Multi-sport facility in Monroe Township with 4 climate-controlled padel courts, pickleball, golf simulators, coaching, and mixed-doubles leagues.

name: And Padel
description: Indoor padel club in Oakland, NJ with 3 championship courts under 40-foot ceilings, led by former U.S. national squash team coach.

name: The Sports Haus
description: 35,000 sq ft indoor sports club in South Norwalk with 5 padel courts, 4 pickleball courts, 2 golf simulators, and social spaces.

name: Sensa Padel Nashville
description: Six outdoor Wilson courts at the iconic Neuhoff development in Germantown, minutes from downtown Nashville, with pro shop, recovery, and social events.

name: Padel Social Bethesda
description: Community-focused outdoor padel club in the DC metro area with 3 courts, full lighting, lessons, clinics, and social events at Westbard Square.

name: SLC Padel Club
description: Utah's first dedicated indoor padel facility near Salt Lake City with 4 premium courts, expert coaching, demo racquet rentals, and year-round events.

name: Kinetic Indoor Racquet Club
description: Indoor racquet club in Boynton Beach with a padel court alongside squash courts, fitness area, pro shop, and professional physiotherapy.
